dataIdInfo.idAbs: Modeled 87Sr/86Sr for locally weathered Sr, accounting for variation in weathering rate and Sr concentration of major and minor lithologies within each grid cell. Data appear in figure 9A of Bataille and Bowen, 2012.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Modeled Sr isotope ratios for use in preliminary assessments and project design. Subject to inaccuracies as discussed in source citation.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Bataille, C. P. and G. J. Bowen (2012). "Mapping 87Sr/86Sr variations in bedrock and water for large scale provenance studies." Chemical Geology 304-305: 39-52. Downloaded from http://waterisotopes.org (access date).
